SELECT COUNT(classes.c_no )FROM CLASSES INNER JOIN MEMBER ON classes.MEMBER_NO = MEMBER.MEMBER_NO WHERE MEMBER.MEMBER_NO =#{member_no}

SELECT m.member_no,m.MEMBER_id,m.member_nick,m.member_state,m.MEMBER_join,m.member_login,m.REPORT_STATE,m.SUSPENSION,am.member_email,am.member_phone FROM MEMBER m FULL JOIN arori_member am ON M.MEMBER_NO=am.MEMBER_NO WHERE instr(${type},#{keyword})>0 ORDER BY m.member_no ASC

SELECT m.member_no,m.member_id,m.member_nick,m.member_state,m.member_join,m.member_login,m.report_state,m.suspension,m.member_auth,am.member_email,am.member_phone FROM MEMBER m LEFT OUTER JOIN ARORI_MEMBER am ON m.MEMBER_NO = am.member_no ORDER BY member_no ASC
